endpoint Class

Defined in: lib/api/endpoint.js:3
Module: endpoint
Parent Module: arango

The api module to maintain endpoints in ArangoDB.

  • Methods

(
  • endpoint
  • databases
  • callback
)
Promise

Defined in lib/api/endpoint.js:14

creates an endpoint

Parameters:

  • endpoint String
    • the endpoint specification, e.g. tcp://127.0.0.1:8530
  • databases List
    • a list of database names the endpoint is responsible for.
  • callback Function
    • The callback function.
